rs.ac.ns.ftn.tmd.datatypes
Class LRFuzzyNumber

java.lang.Object
  rs.ac.ns.ftn.tmd.datatypes.LRFuzzyNumber
All Implemented Interfaces:
FuzzySet
public class LRFuzzyNumber
extends java.lang.Object
implements FuzzySet

Implementation of L-R fuzzy numbers and arithmetics between them

Author:
Nikola Kolarovic

LRFuzzyNumber

public LRFuzzyNumber(double modalValue,
                     double alpha,
                     double beta,
                     int Ltype,
                     int Rtype)
Constructor for L-R fuzzy numbers

Parameters:
modalValue - central value of a fuzzy number
alpha - worst-case interval left of modal value
beta - worst-case interval right of modal value
Ltype - type of function for Left function
Rtype - type of function for Right function

checkImplementationCompatibilityWith

protected void checkImplementationCompatibilityWith(FuzzySet second)
checks if two fuzzy number interpretations are same.
If not, throw a UncompatibileFuzzyArithmeticsException with a message.

Parameters:
second - compare type of current object with the "second" one.

isPositive

protected int isPositive()
checks if FuzzyNumber is completely positive or negative

Returns:
-1 if negative; 1 if positive; 0 if it spreads over 0.

multiply

public FuzzySet multiply(FuzzySet arg2)
Fuzzy operation for multiplication of two fuzzy numbers.
First argument for the operation is the current object, and second argument is given as a function parameter.
For this function it is very important that numbers don't have zero in their confidence intervals, because the multiplication operation is not defined in that case.

This operation uses secant approximation to keep the group closed (L-R).

Specified by:
multiply in interface FuzzySet
Parameters:
arg2 - second argument for the operation
Returns:
number which is the result of the operation
Throws:
FuzzyMultiplicaitonByZeroException - if one of the interval contains zero (0) value in universal set - operation is not valid.

UncompatibileFuzzyArithmeticsException - if fuzzy number implementations are not compatibile
UncompatibileFuzzyArithmeticsException - if fuzzy number implementations are not compatibile

getMultiplicationInverse

public FuzzySet getMultiplicationInverse()
Basically, it is fuzzy 1/X function.
Calculates new FuzzyNumber which represents the multiplication inverse fuzzy number for the current one, using the secant approximation.

Specified by:
getMultiplicationInverse in interface FuzzySet
Returns:
fuzzy 1/X number
Throws:
FuzzyDivisionByZeroException - if number contains 0 value in it's domain

getLeftBoundary

public double getLeftBoundary()
Calculates left boundary of a fuzzy number. It is value of the worst case interval on the left side, value in which membership function has value 0+.

Specified by:
getLeftBoundary in interface FuzzySet
Returns:
left boundary value in universal set X

getLeftSpread

public double getLeftSpread()
Calculates value of left spread, which is distance from the modal value to the left boundary.

Specified by:
getLeftSpread in interface FuzzySet
Returns:
distance from modal value to left boundary, which is always >0

distance

public FuzzySet distance(FuzzySet arg2)
Description copied from interface: FuzzySet
Operacion que implementa la distancia numerica entre 2 objetos de tipo FuzzySet. Dada la de tipos de datos existentes (cualquier dato de este paquete implementa la clase FuzzySet) existiran muchas combinaciones distintas y el tipo del resultado dependera de ello. Por ejemplo, la distancia entre un escalar y un conjunto numerico es otro conjunto numerico; pero la distancia entre un escalar y un numero borroso es otro numero borroso.

Specified by:
distance in interface FuzzySet
Returns:
Un objeto FuzzySet con la distancia entre los 2 parametros

sqrt

public FuzzySet sqrt()
Description copied from interface: FuzzySet
Aplica una raiz cuadrada al dato que llama a este metodo. El tipo del resultado sera el mismo que el tipo del dato que hace la llamada.

Specified by:
sqrt in interface FuzzySet
Returns:

existsImprecision

public boolean existsImprecision()
Specified by:
existsImprecision in interface FuzzySet
Returns:
true si el dato que llama a este metodo tiene imprecision simple (es un conjunto numerico o dato borroso) y false en caso de que no tenga imprecision (un escalar)

existsFuzzyImprecision

public boolean existsFuzzyImprecision()
Specified by:
existsFuzzyImprecision in interface FuzzySet
Returns:
true si existe incertidumbre de tipo borrosa en el dato que llama a este metodo y false en caso de que no la tenga (que sea un dato exacto o con incertidumbre simple).

distrust

public FuzzySet distrust(float minDistrust,
                         float maxDistrust)
Description copied from interface: FuzzySet
Este metodo aplica una desconfianza por debajo y por arriba al dato que llama a este metodo. Por ejemplo si aplicamos desconfianza a un escalar exacto se transformara en un conjunto numerico.

Specified by:
distrust in interface FuzzySet
Returns:
